subject: repetition insolvent
body:
It is understood Warner Bros has been in talks with the public agency
responsible for attracting film-makers to the Highlands.
Loading deal, please wait. SCATTERED RAIN SHOWERS.
A DENSE FOG ADVISORY MEANS VISIBILITIES WILL FREQUENTLY BE REDUCED TO
LESS THAN ONE QUARTER MILE.
Fishing, the traditional mainstay of both the Sutherland and Caithness
economies, has dwindled as a result of swingeing cuts in quotas. This
file is usually updated about every two minutes. LIGHT WINDS
CONTINUING.
LIGHT WINDS CONTINUING.
MOSTLY CLOUDY SKIES WITH ISOLATED SHOWERS THROUGH THE MORNING FOR SITKA
AND POINTS NORTH.
